publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-342# Shona Robison: Fibromyalgia Awareness Weekâ€”That the Parliament recognises that Fibromyalgia Awareness Week 2003 will take place from 13 to 20 September; welcomes the range of activities taking place across Scotland during this time; congratulates Tayside, Angus and Perthshire Fibromyalgia Support Group for organising the first Scotland-wide fibromyalgia conference at Ninewells Hospital, Dundee, and hopes that by raising awareness there will be a better understanding of fibromyalgia and an improvement in the services provided to people with this condition.
S2M-342# Fibromyalgia Awareness Week (lodged on 12 September 2003) Christine Grahame*, Rosie Kane*, Tommy Sheridan*, Donald Gorrie*
S2M-342# Fibromyalgia Awareness Week (lodged on 12 September 2003) Michael Matheson*
S2M-342# Fibromyalgia Awareness Week (lodged on 12 September 2003) Alex Neil*
S2M-342# Fibromyalgia Awareness Week (lodged on 12 September 2003) Mr Adam Ingram*
S2M-342# Fibromyalgia Awareness Week (lodged on 12 September 2003) Bristow Muldoon*
